page.title: 01Welcome to INSCH.
page.content: Insch is a growing market town in the heart of the Garioch,sheltered by the Founland hills to the north and the Bennachie range to the south.Dunnydeer hill is the main feature one sees on approaching Insch. The land is good arable ground where mixed farming is mainly carried on. There are a number of service indus_ tries in the village and across from the mart there is a small industrial estate with two unlet units on it. Insch has a compact shopping and commercial centre with adequate road and rail links to the north and south. The town is fortunate in having a cottage hospital with a modern health centre attached to it. Golf,tennis,bowling or bridge,boxing, badminton__a pastime to suit all tastes may be found in Insch.
